alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 03 at 2:03PM EST until December 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph for a brief period of time. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. Strongest winds will be for a brief period through mid afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
